urls.description: 28/04/21 @ 9:30 am - 12:00 pm - 2021 is a landmark year for UKSIF as it marks our 30th anniversary. We are marking this milestone with a series of engaging activities, including the launch of UKSIF‚Äôs new Policy Vision, setting out the steps we believe policymakers and others should take to cement the UK‚Äôs leadership on sustainable finance. entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

text: @piersmorgan @BBCNews @Sotlive @BBCRadioStoke @GMB @itvnews Thousands of people have signed and are signing this petition from all over the UK, calling for a change in the way the @EnvAgency regulate odour coming from landfills. UK media.........nothing. https://t.co/DBOfaTN2pj

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

text:
Please sign the petition and RT.

We are in desperate need to change how the @EnvAgency monitors and regulates landfills nationally. 
#stopthestink #WalleysQuarry 

https://t.co/UvXfjCh4g0

Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Site
